turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to order something from Starbucks. Can you help me out, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll like to order a cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from North Eastern Avenue in Las Vegas, Nevada.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande cappacino with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on northeastern avenue, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's a bit.That's about it. Thank you very much for your help.
